Description: Renovated two bedroom penthouse with deeded direct-access garage parking spot and spectacular roof deck with panoramic views. Well-appointed open kitchen with granite counters and breakfast bar, spacious living room, two generous bedrooms, and updated bath. Hardwood floors throughout, washer/dryer in-unit, central air and professionally managed building. Ideally located near South Boston's best restaurants and bars, Foodies, Broadway T Station and the bus to downtown. Easy access to I-93 and the Mass Pike, Castle Island, Lawn on D, and all of the other conveniences of the area. Available 9/1.
